RelatedSentence: New Hampshire State Police say a motorcyclist has been killed in a crash on Interstate 93 .
State police say the 57 - year - old man was traveling south on I - 93 in the town of Canterbury on Sunday afternoon when he went off the side of the road and hit several trees .
State police say the 57 - year - old man was traveling south on I - 93 in the town of Canterbury on Sunday afternoon when he went off the side of the road and hit several trees .
State police say the 57 - year - old man was traveling south on I - 93 in the town of Canterbury on Sunday afternoon when he went off the side of the road and hit several trees .
State police have not yet released his name .
Troopers say it appears a medical condition may have contributed to the crash .
The man was wearing a helmet and appropriate protective gear .
